website_summaries.verdict: These locks are a little larger than others and hold up better.
pros: Work well on zippers and small lockers
Company is responsive if you have problems with the locks
Locks come in orange or black
cons: Setting the combination can be a little difficult
Some people have a hard time reopening their locks

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tested it first
customer_reviews.text: Planned to try use it at the small gym locker yesterday. Glad I tested it first in my hand at home, before locking up my clothes and valuables -- the lock did not reopen!!!! It's now permanently locked, and does not open either with 000 or with my own code. Obviously very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonette

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these-- TSA could not open
customer_reviews.text: Just checked in at the airport and got a call that TSA could not open locks-- had to give them the combo over the phone, almost had to go all the way back to the check in and then through security again. NOT a good way to start trip. Waste of money and not worth the hassle at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa82

customer_reviews.title: TSA cut it off on 1st use...
customer_reviews.text: The TSA cut it off on my very first use. TSA left a note to alert me my bag was inspected, yet NO LOCK to be found ANYWHERE IN SIGHT, in bag or otherwise (it was confiscated or discarded by TSA). This fact makes me suspect that the lock is not TSA approved (otherwise it presumably would have been opened with their universal lock and then re-affixed).
customer_reviews.author: tldmb

customer_reviews.title: almost impossible to read numbers,  tossed into recycle bin :(
customer_reviews.text: almost impossible to read numbers, small and difficult to pick the right numbers even under led desk lamp. i tossed mine into trash, i am sure as a luggage lock it's good, but who needs trouble at airport fussing with a difficult lock? TO BE FAIR: i wrote and got quick polite response, they were going to send me a free replacement... but who wants another? when i didn't like the first one?
customer_reviews.author: Modibo_Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not a dependable item
customer_reviews.text: I just arrived in Amsterdam at 7 am after traveling all night and this lock would not unlock. I had tested the lock and combination several times before using it as this was the first time I used it having just purchased it yesterday. I definitely have the correct combination and 2 other people tried to open it as well and it just won’t open. Thankfully the hotel staff was able to cut the lock off or I would not be able to get to my belongings. I guess I will be shopping for a new lock while I sightsee. Frustrating, tired and jet-lagged, this is the last thing you need when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Rlinc

customer_reviews.title: Not quite TSA approved
customer_reviews.text: The locks themselves are great. Easy to set your own combination, very sturdy. However, the two-pack originally purchased have now both been lost due to TSA cutting them off in spite of being "TSA Approved." I blame TSA more for this than the product or company selling them, but buyers should beware that having a TSA approved lock does nothing for security when the lazy agents can't be bothered with proper use and just cut them off. Both instances were during domestic connections, too. Mildly infuriating.
customer_reviews.author: T. E. E.

customer_reviews.title: Pay Attention to Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: These are great locks and worked perfectly for my trip. I've never been a victim of theft but I was going on a travel tour (first time) and was worried that something might happen along my travels. The only warning I'll give is ***PAY ATTENTION TO INSTRUCTIONS*** I was careless and did not follow correct instructions with one of my locks (I purchased two). Needless to say, I felt like an idiot. Thankfully their customer service is impeccable and they responded to my email quickly. However, you have to send the lock back for another, there's no easy fix to "reset" and start over. No one's fault but my own. Highly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: The Divine Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Handy lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little lock. I changed the 3digit combination in seconds. But this lock didn’t work for what I need. I wanted to use this to lock a gate that keeps being left unlatched. Not for security, just to keep the gate closed. And while it went right onto the gate latch and locked, the flexible loop moves too easily and bends around just enough to release the latch and the gate opens anyway. I have to get a lock with a hard metal loop so it won’t move around. But this one may work for some other purpose, so I’ll hang onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally skeptical of government agents and assumed they would just cut the lock off if necessary. My checked bag was stopped for inspection in Germany, and the agents opened the lock without damage and locked it up before sending it on its way. Worth the money for a little extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I tried setting my combination. It didn't work. When you read further, it tells you that you have one opportunity and if you make a mistake, you're out of luck. I then tried with a second lock, but trying to set the combo with this tiny pin and a tiny lock, it's almost impossible to set. The second lock also didn't work. So I had to travel without any locks on my luggage. Very disappointed. Much too difficult and sensitive to set.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wisinski

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last a year for a regular traveler.
customer_reviews.text: edit: Lock broke at 7 months of use. I cannot do anything with it now. Was great until I tried to change the lock code. It no longer unlocks on the new code to old. I'll have to cut this lock if I want to use my bag again. Disappointing because the lock worked great until now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to see black on silver numbers.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock, otherwise worthy of 5 stars, but don't buy this if you have eye problems/wear glasses. The black on silver number scheme is hard for older eyes to see. This can be made worse with flickering fluorescent lights, glare from eye glasses and shadows. If you use this in the gym, you'll need to bring your eyeglasses into the shower and then get the tilt the lock just right even with your glasses on in order to see the numbers to open the lock. If you have young eyes, this is a great lock and the guy next to you probably won't be able to see your combination.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TSA Approved / Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: TSA approved for sure, got a note from TSA in my bag when I back from New Year. I purchase some other locks which marketing as TSA approved, but end up damaged by TSA in the past. The customer service is quick and awesome. My wife set a wrong code which she forgot right after she changed it. The customer service asked my wife to purchase a new one and they will refund it right after they receive the payment.
customer_reviews.author: SWEIL

customer_reviews.title: or didnt bother replacing them because the three good locks were missing from my baggage when I picked ...
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 4 pack I only have one that works which i only use now for securing my suitcase in a hotel room. One lock was received locked already and could not be opened so the company sent a replacement, which I appreciated. Two stars for that. But evidently TSA doesnt have keys to these locks and just broke them, or didnt bother replacing them because the three good locks were missing from my baggage when I picked them up in baggage claim. Just using plastic ties again.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my gym locker. Nice color to easily ID locker fast. CONS: release button on top not easily accessible once on locker door due to type of locker handle. Also, combination portion is not easy to manipulate, doesn't hold in place when adjusting for other numbers. Also very clumbsy to first set combination - have to hold pen on little area with one hand while dial in combination with other hand. Does not feel as sturdy as other TSA locks either. But I would have kept it actually fit my locker.
customer_reviews.author: chakeetah

customer_reviews.title: Good little lock, great guarantee
customer_reviews.text: Very nice locks. I would caution that you should be careful to align the numbers correctly when setting your new code. If you flub it, you'll have to get a new lock. What's also great is that this company offers a "no questions asked" guarantee if you have a problem with the lock. We ordered 2 of them, and had a snafu with one, so we're actually waiting on a replacement now. I tried locking and unlocking my lock after I set up my new code, and had no issues. The lock also looks great on my new navy and orange luggage. I will recommend these locks.
customer_reviews.author: duciel218

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is easy to use, including changing to your own combination. I like the bright orange color, it's visible! The flexible covered wire loop is great for various locking situation too. Now if the TSA just cooperates and doesn't break this lock like they did the previous locks I owned (they were a different brand and style, but still TSA approved), I will be perfectly happy!
customer_reviews.author: Artist and Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: update to first review
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, but both locks now will not open. I use the same code on all locks so know that I used the correct one, plus they opened for a few days. Now they are garbage. I would not buy these again. I did buy the masterlock ones to replace these that I only used once and ordered just last month. Don't waste your money on these. This is the first negative review that I have written on Amazon, sorry, but these locks are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LOIS

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for a suitcase or backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice added security for a suitcase zipper and to make it hard for people to get in your backpack when you've turned your back for a second. They can walk off with it of course but this is to stop the thieves who boldly sit next to you at the airport and go in the pockets when you're distracted. Nobody will get in the pockets with these on. Has a quick release button too. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: No One

customer_reviews.title: Great locks, exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Great locks, exactly what i needed,one of the 6 locks came dead, before i use the locks, i reset their 0000 lock combo and set my own,same unlock combo to all 6,after set up i try to open one by one, just one fail, simply wont unlock. ,i reach CS and Lotte was cool, i got replacement for the bad lock, the lock are tested daily for the unlock and lock system and it works beautifully with no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Great locks for its price!
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere on amazon and finally decided to take a risk with these. Bought 3 in orange with hopes that they would stand out in the sea of other luggages and they sure did! Was a bit hesitant initially but the price was low enough compared to others on amazon that it was worth a choice and I was definitely not disappointed. They arrived on time and the seller even sent a personal email to follow up on the order. All 3 locks arrived on time and the instructions were super easy. Took these locks across the ocean and it still made it back in one piece. Pretty sure they will last for a few more trips !!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Y

customer_reviews.title: Takes Two to Set and Tango
customer_reviews.text: Need Three Hands. Probably a great product if I get to use it. While trying to set a new code, by holding the lock with one hand, and turning the numbers with the other hand, and somehow holding in the set silver pin, all slipped and some unknown code was set never to be discovered by me. Sent email to seller about a week ago for replacement, but have not heard back. Might have to chance it and buy a new lock and try again. After all it is not that expensive. Should I get to use the lock, I will revise this review.
customer_reviews.author: John P Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2-pack of locks for an upcoming Ireland trip. When I re-set the locks to a different combination, the first lock worked just fine while the second wouldn't open. It's possible that I screwed up the combination with my fat fingers. But regardless I contacted the seller and they offered to replace the lock free of charge, and I didn't need to send in the one that didn't work. That alone deserves a 5-star review!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: kept me secure
customer_reviews.text: These locks kept my belongings secure in DC/NYC .. now, i cant say if they REALLY kept them secure. But, they kept my piece if mine secure as nothing went missing. But, i like the think that when i wasn't around these locks, they found off waves of ninja assassins trying to take a peak at my underwear. Oh, the brown stains they would have encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Smatthew

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the combination numbers don’t just move into fixed slots to make this conveniently easy. There is too much wiggle room so even ...
customer_reviews.text: Combination lock does not work very well. Apparently, you need to position the numbers precisely in the right alignment, otherwise the unlock button becomes hard to press down. Unfortunately the combination numbers don’t just move into fixed slots to make this conveniently easy. There is too much wiggle room so even if you have the right combo of numbers, you may have to make minor adjustments to unlock it. I’m surprised by all the positive reviews. Feels like a lot of lost sheep just following the tide off the cliff. I’ll admit I’m very particular and for good reason as consumers deserve what we pay for.
customer_reviews.author: wsj1889

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock.  Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great little locks. I use them on the luggage I carry on the back of my motorcycle and they are solid and fit right thru the zippers. I did have a problem with the first set that was sent to me as I couldn't get them open to set the new combination. Contacted the company that makes them and they quickly worked with me to get another set of locks sent out to me at no cost to me. Arrived in a few days and worked perfectly. No hassle at all.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Went on a trip to Europe and it was recommended we have luggage locks. Read many reviews on many locks and decided to try these. You very seldom find reviews without negative responses but I had no issues of any kind with these locks. TSA never questioned us about the locks, the combination was easy to set. and the locks held without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Moss

customer_reviews.title: Can't be used
customer_reviews.text: I received the lock without issue but then hit a problem. I followed the detailed instructions as to how to set the combination and then closed the lock. I have never been able to open it again. I set the dials on the combination and it will not open. I even entered the default setting of "0-0-0" and it still won't open. The thing is now totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight, perfect for our travels
customer_reviews.text: These little guys made us feel better when our luggage was out and about in some airport somewhere in Europe that's for sure!! They functioned as intended, were easy to set our combinations to, open and close, lightweight enough to use on our day backpack......what else is there?! The color was very visible to both us and to others, which is what you want right?! Would never dream of travelling without locks and these were great.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkling Tess

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. TSA cut it off my suitcase so i had no lock for my luggage on my vacation. My luggage wasnt even inspected, just the lock removed. Id return it if i could.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly420

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, but perhaps not liked by TSA so much
customer_reviews.text: These sturdy locks worked beautifully, locked and unlocked without a hitch HOWEVER apparently TSA views locks as perhaps protecting something dangerous/illegal because, on the way home from Italy, our luggage arrived minus the locks. My bag had obviously been tossed although nothing was stolen and the locks were nowhere to be seen. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Crozetian

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is so durable that makes me feel safe every time I'm traveling. They are very well made, sturdy and very good for the price. The only thing is you need to be careful when aligning the numbers to unlock it, they tend to move and if they are not perfectly aligned it will not unlock (I like that too, although it can be a pain for desperate people).
customer_reviews.author: Denisse S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several TSA locks as a frequent traveler around the US as well as Europe. The benefits of a good lock are obvious. I was very impressed with the weight first and then the solid feel, ease of changing the combination and easy to open. I highly recommend this for the great value at $5 each.
customer_reviews.author: gstam

customer_reviews.title: Security while traveling
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid traveler I'm always leery of luggage being tampered with while in route to my destination. I purchased this lock for one of my smaller bags, but it would also work well on any size piece of luggage. A simple 3 number combo provides all the safety and security I need. If your a traveler do yourself a favor and grab a couple of these locks. It also has a nice indicator to tell if your bag has been opened. I'll be adding more to all my travel bags
customer_reviews.author: David McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for suitcase, a bit heavy for back packs
customer_reviews.text: These are great locks! Especially if you are traveling with luggage. I am traveling with a backpacking style backpack and want to secure all the many zippers. The locks are super sturdy, but because of that they are heavy. This would not be a problem on a suitcase, but when you are backpacking, weight is very important. Needing to need to add all 6 of them to the pack, makes it more heavy than I'd like. I do appreciate how secure they seem though. I will love them when I use my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: motomama

customer_reviews.title: Nice locks
customer_reviews.text: These locks are easy to set up. Just choose a pin you want and directions are very clear on how this is accomplished. Locks are sturdy and can be unlocked by TSA if needed. The release button on top is slightly awkward but given the design its quite functional. I his for the price and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... match my new luggage and the cable was a better option with the zipper tags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they match my new luggage and the cable was a better option with the zipper tags, but programming them really requires 3 hands. If the programming pin springs out, you are stuck with the code it is on, not the one you wanted. It's really a 3 handed operation. I will be returning one. I like the way it looks and works with my luggage, but programming takes it down a notch from a 5 to 4.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Erlich

customer_reviews.title: Great, TSA-approved deterrent to baggage handling or other would-be thieves.
customer_reviews.text: Strong locks, bright color for additional easy identification of dark bags at baggage claim, and the thin wire fastener fits through even the tiny zipper pulls on Joy Mangano luggage (takes a bit of maneuvering, but it does fit). My only issues: 1. The numbers are very small, and several look so similar that, even with reading glasses, it is difficult to find the combination. I suggest using a code which involves the more distinct numbers. 2. Setting the new combination is a two person operation (or was for us).
customer_reviews.author: Dee H.

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be pretty good locks
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be pretty good locks. the dials are a little funky to spin and set securely in place so make sure you get the exact combination you want and hold the pin in securely while setting the new combo. It works fine! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: pskemp2

customer_reviews.title: Small but good lock
customer_reviews.text: These locks work fine and buying the 4 pack saves money especially when traveling with lots of luggage. I had problems with the readability of the numbers and since it is small, moving a dial may cause you to accidentally move an adjacent dial. The lock still works perfectly though after our international trip and withstood a good amount of beating and scratches. It’s a good buy if you just need a basic TSA lock.
customer_reviews.author: K Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: The way the combination is set is completely unforgiving and if you make a mistake (very easy to do as it is very awkward with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Stay far away from this. I bought 2 - the first time I just figured I did something wrong. The way the combination is set is completely unforgiving and if you make a mistake (very easy to do as it is very awkward with a combination of holding a button in while rotating the dials - VERY awkward making this prone to screw up) the lock becomes useless. I decided to eat the $16 I paid for the 2 locks and I am ordering one of these that works very easily from Master lock (no way to screw that lock up). This was a huge mistake and I should have known better after the first messed up lock.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Lock With Ease
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to set instructions easy to understand and that's part of it can looked locked even if it's not. extremely easy to set instructions easy to understand best part is it can looked locked even if it's not. So if you just need to do something real quickly you can give the appearance without having to reset the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Good little locks, but lacking quality control
customer_reviews.text: Convenient little locks. A bit heavy for their size. They're TSA locks, so don't expect them to be heavy-duty for security purposes. They'll keep out the pick-pocket and plunderer types, but I wouldn't leave this type of lock on container or building that was stationary and which I would leave unattended for a long period of time. One of my locks was already locked with a combination when I received it and could not open it, so it was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Quinley

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The locks work as expected. So far, they held up on a European adventure from the US. The one thing we did do, because they all look the same and used different codes, was used marker/paint to draw a shape on each of the locks so we can distinguish them from each other.
customer_reviews.author: NeviTales

customer_reviews.title: Good lock but be careful of setting codes
customer_reviews.text: I traveled two countries seven cities with checked luggage locked by this TSA code lock and they all survived. Very good money value. Here are some drawbacks: The little pin hole to set password is tricky to work with And need to be tightly pushed thru code setting. One of the four lock dead because I unconsciously loose the push while turning combination codes dialer.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: A quality product from a quality company
customer_reviews.text: Not only do the set of locks operate flawlessly but they are as solid as they come! I have come to trust TravelMore products not to fail as I journey where life takes me. The ease of use and reliable operation inspires confidence that TravelMore products will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: George Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I found setting the combination was too difficult. Holding in the pin and turning the numbers at the same time. I’m in my 70s so chalked it up to my age but my 18 year old grandson had the same problem. I was traveling the next day so had to make a run to the store and get a key lock.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to figure out any combination!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to figure out the combination for these locks, regardless of the combination that is set by a user. Simply push and hold down the release button and spin each number. They will stop and will not turn in either direction; once all 3 are figured out, the lock pops right open. These are not good quality for traveling if you are securing anything if value. I bought these last-minute due to the electronics bad from flights originating in the middle east. Would not recommend, would not buy again. For a backpack full of clothes, these will work just fine. But if you're carrying electronics that are worth anything, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: 98RamSS/T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flexible little locks
customer_reviews.text: They are luggage/backpack locks, they work perfect and they are easy to maneuver with the flexibility of the cables and cheaper than I could find at Walmart. No more need be said. The shipping was fast and packaging small, which made it easy to open and fit in the mailbox. The seller eMailed me several times to make sure that I was completely satisfied and that was refreshing. I would buy again and I would for sure buy from the seller again,.
customer_reviews.author: PDT447

customer_reviews.title: These locks work great. The only problem I have had is that ...
customer_reviews.text: These locks work great. The only problem I have had is that after inspecting my bow case, one the locks wasn't locked back, which means the case arrived back in the US minus one lock. That wasn't the lock's fault. The cable makes threading the lock through the latches much easier, which is why I have now purchased six more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wiman

customer_reviews.title: Maybe okay for some but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: A nice lock but not real easy to set. One of the four I bought seems frozen and won’t unlock; the other three work okay but not real smoothly. Frankly I did not feel comfortable using any of them for an upcoming trip for fear that I couldn’t unlock them when needed. The company said they would replace them at no charge but haven’t yet pursued their offer.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a good quality item. It looks sturdy and strong + flexible. It is easy to use. Of course, this is an early review of the product and once it has been tested through my frequent travels, I will be happy to provide a renewed review, if necessary. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Bhatnagar

customer_reviews.title: It keeps your bags closed
customer_reviews.text: The airport people either cut my lock or it fell off! When I claimed my baggage from an European vacation, it was gone! Really aggravates me to pay for stuff and some jerk just cut it. But it did keep my suitcase together and was easy to spot with the bright color. Good thing there was more than 1.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great locks for multi-use
customer_reviews.text: Great locks. Feels very solid and durable. The lock wire is pretty big (compared to their solid version) so I can see these coming in handy for other bags or situations I cannot think of at the moment. Very impressed with the customer service follow ups for the delivery update and their service approach.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lock didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t unlock and they say just throw it away and buy a new one and they will reimburse you. Not an exchange. I’m not spending more money and hopes they will reimburse me.
customer_reviews.author: noah henry

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy w/ Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We recently used these locks for a vacation that required several transfers of our luggage inside and outside of the airport. We wanted to use these to ensure it discouraged a quick peek inside by someone. We had no issues with items missing and the locks stayed in place. There was no damage to zippers or luggage and the TSA didn't cut them as they have other locks we've purchased in the past. Locks are very easy to set combination and simple to use in general. Should we have the need in the future we would purchase more of these.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Got these locks mainly for our train rides in Europe but we figured might as well get TSA approved locks so that we can use it for flights as well. Simple instructions, easy to set up and change, and it matches our suitcase so it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Moshe D

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy and hard to notice.
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to Europe in a week and decided to buy some bag locks for me and my family so we could have some piece and mind. I love these locks, they're easy to set the combo and seem very sturdy. I hope I don't "get use from them" but I'm happy to be using them. I put one on my everyday bag to try it out, worked very well! Put one on my carry on bag and it works well without being overly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: madi

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I did not put this lock on my luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Travel More states that they will replace the lock free of charge if the lock malfunctions. They did not nor did they contact me. I reset the lock according to the instructions and reopened it. I tried it the second time and it would not open.
customer_reviews.author: BLKSUPERIOR

customer_reviews.title: Very handy color.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy color. Allows you to see instantly where your luggage is in the carousel. Push button release is very handy, too. However, wouldn't stop a determined thief for too long and the numbers are exceedingly small and difficult to read. I use them to lock firearm cases locked in vehicle trunk for transport and they work very well for that because the containers are double locked and always kept close.
customer_reviews.author: Stealthmimic

customer_reviews.title: Good product Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my trip to Europe and my luggage was safe. Easy to use and not very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Won't help if TSA cuts it off or don't put it back after inspection.
customer_reviews.text: These locks were easy to use & easy to set up for your choice of combination code. Unfortunately, the 1st time I used one on a recent trip, the baggage inspectors either just cut it off or forgot to put it back on because it was gone when I picked up my suitcase @ the destination baggage claim terminal. At least I knew my suitcase was opened, so I knew to check for any missing things. Nothing lost, except for the lock. Oh well, not the fault of the lock.
customer_reviews.author: amazon-paradox

customer_reviews.title: Travel more cable combo lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock easy to use flexible but secure cable. I was able to lock multiple zippers on my backpack as well as my luggage. Instructions were easy and product worked as advertised ! Unfortunately on one of my flights they cut the lock to check my bag! I had no problems on several prior flights so they probably just didn't want to bother with the TSA key. Luckily I bought more than one. I also really liked the orange color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That was great. Compared to other TSA travel locks I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The first lock came being locked. The customer service sent me a new working one immediately when I contacted them via Amazon email. That was great. Compared to other TSA travel locks I have used, this is more on the heavier side, so I decided to use it for my gym locker instead of my carriers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Choo

customer_reviews.title: Great as a deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Great as a deterrent; It'll keep your backpack from being pick-pocketed while in crowds without being too annoying to insert and remove. While the band wouldn't survive a good pair of shears, but nothing that size will, and it wouldn't need to if it's just going on your backpack/laptop case/camera bag which you ought to keep on your person while traveling anyway. It probably wouldn't be my first choice to lock luggage that won't be in my sight the whole time, but with airport security being high I don't typically lock my luggage anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great locks, But they disappear!
customer_reviews.text: Great locks - the cable makes it easier to use. Having the button open it makes it less likely for the lock to fall out accidentally if you forget to move the dials. UPDATE. Had to reduce rating due to unforeseen problem that the locks don't seem to make the trip. Either tear off or screeners don't like them, but my first three locks disappeared on my first three trips to use them. Bummer because I really do like them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Would not unlock
customer_reviews.text: Set the lock and was able to open it several times. After securing it to my device (same day) I then attempted to open it again. It would not open. 3 if us tried to open it multiple times to no avail. Had to cut it off.
customer_reviews.author: MissouriFamily

customer_reviews.title: 6 star customer service
customer_reviews.text: strong seems well built quite heavy. Easy to set. I bought a package of 4 within a day of receiving them received an email if any problems with my locks. In fact one of them would not work after I set the combination, was quickly replaced . Excellent customer service highly recommend this company. they also have a flexible vinyl covered cable instead of a fixed shackle.
customer_reviews.author: pgobeem

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the need
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and easy to operate. Used these to secure our luggage on a trip to Asia with no problems at all. Of course they are just small devices made more to deter a thief looking for an easy opportunity, but they are really pretty strong and sturdy and it appears that it would take a lot more than a pair of dykes or wire cutters to get through that cable. Very pleased with our purchase of these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Law

customer_reviews.title: Lock wouldn’t open. Sent back.
customer_reviews.text: Seems I have received a previously returned lock. My lock came in a small ziplock bag that was closed with tape. No instructions, just tossed in the box with other items I had ordered. Someone must have put their combination in because my lock wouldn’t even open. Return started.
customer_reviews.author: God Is Everywhere

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical in purchasing these because of reviews I had seen but all 6 of them worked wonderfully without any problems. They were easy to set a code on, unlocked every time even after TSA key opened them. We love these little locks and will continue to use them and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: MOAM2008

customer_reviews.title: Quality to Price ratio is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple, high-quality luggage lock for my carry-on suitcase. The Travelmore lock had really great reviews, and it was inexpensive, especially compared to the eye-gouging prices of locks at the airport. This is one of those items that definitely lives up to its reputation. It's cheap, but not cheaply made. Setting the combination was extremely easy, and it does the job well. I can easily recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lock and open
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit disappointed when I opened the package and realized this was not a Masterlock lock, I quickly realized I like this lock a little bit more. It is easier to unlock with a press of a button. I've used this at the gym multiple times now and love it!
customer_reviews.author: cka

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to place on my bag that I had to leave in an unattended coat room with many people around. I am very happy with the product; the combination was very easy to set, and the lock itself if very sturdy. I have also used it as a lock for my gym locker! So many uses can be found. I would definitely recommend, and would repurchase if I ever need another!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to set combination
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to set combination. You have to hold the tiny lock with your left hand then press the tiny, tiny button with a pen, and then set the combination. I assume I let off the tiny button enough that it set without me knowing. Now it can't be reset. Would not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Texas G's

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light weight
customer_reviews.text: And flexible. I like the cable as it fits many types of luggage. Used it on my trip to Australia and had no concerns. Though I have forgotten the combo I set since then...lol. But I'll figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Madman With A Camera

customer_reviews.title: Company Follows Up, Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nicely made. Looks sharp. I pushed in the silver button and my husband set the combo. That was easier than trying it to do it by oneself. Am happy with the product so far. We ordered a 4 pack and they all worked fine. We received two follow up emails from the company to make sure everything was to our liking. I appreciated their follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Guenther

customer_reviews.title: so if you read them wrong or aren't too perfect in aligning the new combo's you could be looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when you do the initial setup...the wheels are tiny and the numbers are all block, so if you read them wrong or aren't too perfect in aligning the new combo's you could be looking at a pain to fix...that said, these keep good people honest and can be picked (they ALL can) and fixed with (more than you'd like and lots of time) care..
customer_reviews.author: Notso Underground

customer_reviews.title: A waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: These locks are worthless as after following directions and setting a new combination they wouldn’t open again. Sent them back and got a refund. Skip the aggravation and don’t buy these cheap locks
customer_reviews.author: Golfin Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I depend on high quality luggage locks for my frequent overseas travel. I use these for my handbag and suitcases everywhere I go. These locks are heavy duty and easy to open and close. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Combination so far works good
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't used the product but I like it. The only thing I don't like is in setting up the combination. That part is pretty tricky because u have to hold down a button with a pen to set the combination. I accidentally pre-released the pen and my combination was set with a number I didn't want to use. But that was the only issue I had. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette E.

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great for securing zippered compartments. The problem is two of these locks the threads just pulled out of the locking connection. This was just from normal use so I’d be afraid on how little force it would take to open one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, TSA Approved Lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is very sturdy and survived 6 different airlines so far. It was easy to set the lock code and also easy to unlock/lock while on the luggage. I had no problems using it in it's locked state while going through security and customs or while checking the bag. It always got back to me locked, which is what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Love these locks. Easy to set combo and easy to read numbers. I love the lifetime guarantee as well. We have had other locks that have been broken when traveling ( I assume by rough luggage handlers ). The flexible cables on these locks will help with that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gary McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: The lock only unlocked once for us after setting our code
customer_reviews.text: I set a combination and then tried it to be sure it worked before putting it on my luggage. For some reason it didn’t unlock until my third try. Stupidly I put it on my suitcase and headed out for Europe. We must have tried the combination 25 times once we got to our destination. We had to get bolt cutters from the River Cruise personnel to get into our bag. So, for us it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Good for more than travel
customer_reviews.text: I have a deck storage box that can be locked with a padlock, but the holes for the hasp are too small for a normal sized lock. This little lock is perfect, and there's no key to lose. It's great for this slightly troublesome spot.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Fream

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son who will be doing some traveling. The lock is light weigh but doesn't look or feel cheap. The flexible cable will make it versatile. I liked the choice of colors. The enclosed directions were clear and easy to follow. The combination was easy to set. The shipping was fast amd the seller even followed up with an email which I thought was a nice touch. I can't speak for longevity but from what I have seen so far I don't anticipate any problems.
customer_reviews.author: RunMamaRun

customer_reviews.title: Should do the job
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and easy to change combo to one you'll remember. Is fairly heavy and seems to be built quite well and the design allows for locking more than one zipper connection at once, providing of course that they are near each other. I haven't checked luggage since 9/11 so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Only worked the first couple times.
customer_reviews.text: It was defective. It isn’t the first time I use one of these locks for my luggage. I set up the code and it did work a couple times but then it did not unlock anymore. I had to brake it to get my belongings out of the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as shown. My mother wanted them since they are going out of the country next month. She loves them and the fact that the locks stand out so well. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G.

customer_reviews.title: ... to be turned slightly to be pushed through more easily. So then it was easy to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I had a hard time getting the cable through the eyes of the suitcase zippers but figured out that the cable had to be turned slightly to be pushed through more easily. So then it was easy to get it thru. You have to line the numbers up exactly to get it open and with my old arthritic fingers, it was a little challenging but manageable. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a dependable lock.
customer_reviews.text: It does not open. Even when following the direction sheet exactly. Maybe I just got a defective one. --- It finally did open but it required a lot of messing around. The release lock sticks and the reset dot is hard to hold in. I would not recommend this lock to anyone. It would be frustrating trying to get into your suit case while on a trip..
customer_reviews.author: MGrav

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: 5K mile trip through numerous airports without one failure. Too large a diameter for my backpack zippers but they worked great for my luggage. I'd buy these exact same ones again.
customer_reviews.author: BeemerPilot

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these sturdy
customer_reviews.text: TSA inspected my luggage at some point in my travels. The agent was able to unlock the locks, search my luggage then re-secure everything with no loss of property. I highly recommend these sturdy, functional, TSA-approved locks.
customer_reviews.author: Real Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Lock it up
customer_reviews.text: Easily set your own combo. Well, it does take some manual dexterity, but it’s not super hard. They work great and are sturdy. They have the TSA key lock, so good for airline travels.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Of Two

customer_reviews.title: Not tuff enough
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first it’s bin 3 months but the first time the lock has ever hit the ground ... and it broke into pieces !!!!!! so now I have no lock till i go find one on my lunch break ... if my stuff is not gone already!!!! Very disappointed if they reach out I will update
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P Kosinski

customer_reviews.title: The locks are great and the service is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These will remove temptation from pilferers and protect against pickpockets. I used them on a backpack for travel and they worked great through the zipper pulls. A good hand held wire cutter would defeat them but a box cutter could open the whole backpack. I bought 4 and messed up setting the combination for 1 of them. They had me order a new one and immediately refunded the cost and shipping for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: cryptomath

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lock BUT has its problems...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but lock is not holding up after only 1 business trip. The plastic insulation on the cable link is coming apart from the ends. The locking mechanism is also stiff, sometimes sticks and make you panic thinking its broke and wont unlock your luggage. In summary, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Long wire!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Worked perfect for what i needed which was a suitcase for equipment. I am glad it came in a package of two, because my case was searched by TSA and never got my lock back. I used the second as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Alito Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found these. Although I know that you normally can't lock your luggage when traveling itwas nice to know I could use this lock and they could unlock it if needed. I also kept it on in the hotel room to make sure my bag wasn't disturbed. This worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

product_meta.title: TSA Approved Travel Combination Cable Luggage Locks for Suitcases & Backpacks - 1 Pack of Black TSA Lock
feature_bullets: 1 BLACK LUGGAGE LOCK: You will be receiving a pack of 1 black TSA-approved luggage lock.

MOST DURABLE TSA COMPATIBLE AND RECOGNIZED LOCK: All TravelMore retractable travel locks are 100% travel sentry certified and designed from the ground up to be the strongest and reliable luggage locks in the market. TSA screeners are issued codes and tools for secured access to open the heavy duty locks. Our special high strength zinc alloy lock bodies, hardened steel shackles and patented internal mechanisms can take so much force that we back our product up with an 100% lifetime warranty.

MULTIPLE USES: Our small and weatherproof wire locks can be used on a variety of items. They can be used when traveling on your suitcase or backpack, a gym locker, duffle, golf or carry on bag, briefcase or pelican case and are 100% TSA compliant.

3 DIAL COMBINATION & FLEXIBLE STEEL CABLE: Our easy to master and resettable 3 digit combination can be set to any combo of your choosing for extra security. The flexible metal cable helps with easy threading through all types of luggage zippers.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: Each digital backpacking number lock comes with a 100%, no questions asked replacement money back guarantee. Instructions and a instructional video come with every luggage padlock purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,282 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
